Question: Sonatus CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sonatus

Product: Sonatus CES 2024 Showcase

- Sonatus Vehicle Platform expanded with new solutions and partnerships
- Milestone of deployment in over 1 million production vehicles
- Sonatus Collector integrated with AWS Cloud for real-time data collection
- Sonatus Automator for automation policies and vehicle testing
- New Vehicle Personalization Solution for rich vehicle personalization
- New Software Defined Component Solution for monitoring and tuning vehicle components
- Sonatus Updater for secure management of automotive software updates
- Live demonstrations at CES 2024
- Event speakers and partners
- COVESA Networking Reception
- Related resources and insights
- Accelerating the shift to software-defined vehicles
- Headquarters in Sunnyvale, CA with global offices
- Raised over $110 million USD from leading investors
Summary_cn:
Sonatus

产品：Sonatus CES 2024 展示

- Sonatus 车辆平台通过新的解决方案和合作伙伴得到扩展
- 部署在超过100万辆生产车辆上的重要里程碑
- Sonatus Collector 集成AWS Cloud，实时数据收集
- Sonatus Automator 用于自动化策略和车辆测试
- 新的车辆个性化解决方案，实现丰富的车辆个性化
- 新的软件定义组件解决方案，用于监控和调优车辆组件
- Sonatus Updater，安全管理汽车软件更新
- 在CES 2024上进行现场演示
- 活动发言人和合作伙伴
- COVESA 网络交流会
- 相关资源和见解
- 加速向软件定义车辆转变
- 总部位于加州圣尼维尔，设有全球办事处
- 从领先投资者那里筹集了超过1.1亿美元
